channel.title: Interface issue

item.title: Interface issue
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

So i was adding a new interface and i went to add a button and it is showing the rong interface since i added the new button

This is My Code

public static void skillTab1(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface Interface = addInterface(27880); addSprite(27881, 1, "Interfaces/Skill/Main"); AddInterfaceButton(27882, 1, "Interfaces/Skill/Combat", 80, 20, "Combat", 1); setChildren(2, Interface); setBounds(27881, 7, 6, 0, Interface); setBounds(27882, 14, 13, 0, Interface); }

And this what it is showing

Read full topic
